value.original: Generate Invoices from Orders. Select the orders to generate the invoice for.
Load flat Files into import tables
The Import File Loader parses the content of a flat file and loads it into import tables. Comments start with a '[' and end with a ']' and are ignored; example: [Some Heading].
Set up a new Client/Tenant of the system
Use the upper portion to create new charges using the general charge accounts. Use the lower portion to create charges based on the natural account.
Select vendor invoices for payment. If you don't see an invoice, make sure that it is not included in a different (nprocessed) Payment Selection.
Match Purchase Orders, Receipts, Vendor Invoices

row.value: Corresponder Ordenes de Compra; Recibos; Facturas de Proveedores

value.original: Make sure that the Receipts and Invoices are processed. If you want to match partial shipment, make sure that "Same Quantity" is not selected.

row.value: Importar o Exportar Traducción de Lenguaje.

value.original: Export/Import Translation info to/from xml for translation in external tool. Please note that the Language MUST be an enabled and verified System Langage.
Generate Shipments from Orders. Select the orders to generate the shipments for.

row.value: Mantener Constraseña de Usuarios y Socios del Negocio

value.original: Merge From Entity to To Entity - Delete From

row.value: Mezclar de Entidad en Entidad - De Cancelar

value.original:
Dangerous - Please are aware of what you are doing! All instances of the From entity (e.g. Customer A) are changed to the To entity (e.g. Customer B). The From entity (e.g. Customer A) is deleted.

There is NO undo nor trace ! Please do a backup first Please be aware that you may be changing history records (e.g. invoices, etc.) !

Side effects: Merging Products are likely to distort product costs; Merging Business Partners may result in incorrect open item balance. Check with support on remedies.

Restrictions: Accounting and Inventory conflicts are not resolved in this version.

row.value:
Peligro - Porfavor este usted enterado de lo que esta haciendo! Todos los casos de la entidad (ej. Cliente A) son cambiados para otra entidad (ej. Clientes B). De la entidad (ej. Suprimen al Cliente A)

Hay NINGUN deshace ni remota, Haga porfavor una reserva Esté por favor enterado que usted puede cambiar los expedientes de historia (ej. facturas, etc.)!

Efectos Secundarios: combinandoce los productos es problable torcer costos del producto: La combinación de Socio de negocio puede dar lugar incorrecto a abrir al balance del articulo.

value.original: Enter Transactions via a POS Terminal. Automatically, scans or credit card swipes are recongized.

Drop the extended Bill of Materials into an Order, Invoice, etc. The documents need to be in a Drafted stage. Make sure that the items included in the BOM are on the price list of the Order, Invoice, etc. as otherwise the price will be zero!

value.original: Depending on the Client Automatic Archive Level documents and reports are saved and available for view. In the Report Viewer you can manually archive Documents or Reports. You can only view archives, if you have access to the original document.

row.value: Dependiendo del nivel automático de archivos de la compañía los documentos y reportes que son guardados y puestos a disposición para su visualización.
